price: 116. Mereka berkata, "Wahai Nuh! Sungguh, jika engkau tidak (mau) berhenti, niscaya engkau termasuk orang yang dirajam (dilempari batu sampai mati).”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
